subject: Order #SSN4787
description_text:
Hi,

Package arrived today. I'm missing accessory parts. Please assist.

Regards Abdul

conversations.body_text: Hi Abdul Al Amry,  Please let us know which product you have not received yet, and we will help you check and confirm the status.Â

Hi,

I'm missing all in the screenshot below. Very disappointed. Not sure how I
will mount the haptics now.
Hi Abdul Al Amry,    We apologize for the inconvenience. Please provide a photo showing the package you received, and we will resend it to you as soon as possible.

This is the package. You didn't even include a usb cable for the control
box. I'm very disappointed. I'll have to wait another few more weeks before
I can use the haptics. Terrible packaging to miss the necessary bits to
mount them.
Hi Abdul Al Amry,     Not in this bag? Don't worry, we'll send you a replacement.
